attributes.action: end mid term contract price rises
attributes.additional_details:
It is profiteering by companies to increase prices mid contract and a further insult to add additional costs above the rate of inflation 
A contract is supposed to be a legally binding agreement not a flexible agreement
attributes.background: Make it illegal to change contract terms and conditions until the end of contract date

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Ban charges increasing during fixed-term contracts
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649566
